alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:44PM MST until November 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of trace to 1 inch below 2000 feet, and 2 to 5 inches elsewhere, including Whitebird Hill. Snow rates of 1 inch per hour at times. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
